task.title: Changing number of errors to display

taskbody.context: When you have a large number of errors, it can be useful to limit the number of errors to display at a time.

step.cmd:
In the Problems tab of the Properties view pane , click
.

step.stepresult: The Set Limits dialog box is displayed.

choices.choice: To remove all limits, uncheck the User Marker Limits checkbox.
To set a limit, check the User Marker Limits checkbox and enter the number of errors to display at a time.

step.cmd: Click OK to save your change.
